text: ei putti ya osi neeru tha hadathae
edhu ninna kai na tha hadathae
nee elliya aesu thinguva gelcha maadithae
ninna sarae hana attrae osi tharika
na jaennagu bapa jaama na tha bannae
na aena aegithae nee aena maadinthae
ennu aesu jaama tha sapaena ebbuthu
eni maellae tha na gelcha maadinae
na aena aeguthu aendhdhu gaena buttuptae
na eni maellae ei gelchava maaduthu ellae
mandae besitu manaega ba ellati bara baeda
ninnava noodirae aennaga appara negusu banthara
muuka seenjirae aeka odambu sari ellaya
aenga manaeya aenna amma tha rani
ninga tha saakithara ei nae ya
ninga enna gata aessaga nae saakithii
issh hadhuna aella dhaara arudhu dharae
anga aguvavu tamil pada tha noodiniyu
nee ha raja na kadhaya kaethaya
aeka ei varsha habba maaduthu ellae
aenna sarae ezzhnoora mooru uripi hadathae
aenna sarae eppathi ondhu uripi hadathae
aenna sarae eranoora ombathu uripi hadathae
aenna sarae saavirtha aeradu uripi hadathae
aenna sarae haarnoora mooru uripi hadathae
ei anna ga aerudu madhuvae haipta
nanga tha edhu aellava aegi kodathu
badaga palaya paatu aella ennu sooka attra
aenna sarae thombathi ondhu uripi hadathae
aenna anna na sarae ondhu nae hadathae
santhoshava ebbuthuga olli manasu attrae podhu
ninga hatti appara thoda hatti ya
aenga sarae ondhu kappu dhana hadathae
ninga hatti ya endhdhu habba va
aenna sarae saavirtha haravathi haaru uripi hadathae
aenna sarae haravathi mooru uripi hadathae
aenna sarae eambathi aeradu uripi hadathae
ninna sarae hana attrae osi tharika
ei koosu thanna appa na maakae edhdhanae noodu
e vaara na aeradu jaenna tha pallitu hadathae
na ninna aluvuga bandi odisi ariyae
anga aguvavu tamil pada tha noodiniyu
ninna akka na ghanda na hesaru aena
ba manaega osi seluvu esi bapa
ei kadai ya battae aella sooka attra
ninga hatti ya endhdhu habba va
aenna sarae sillarae ellae ninna sarae attrae kodu
na ninnava buttu aelligu opputhu ellae
ei koosu thanna amma na maakae edhdhanae noodu
ollenge haratha havaka sarae mattu tha ragasiya aegakku
siggu maana aella ondhu ellaya ninnaga
ei kadai orrukuthu maellaena tha tharadhara
habba jaenna aella manaeya koi maadiyara
eni maellae tha nanga haata va hadadhu
edhu ninna akka na ghanda thanae
kai yogae kannadiya beethindhu neeruna moga noodidha aenge
ondhu jaena na aerudu theruku tha na kaapi kudathanae
na aeguvavu santhu mattu tha neeru hatinae
aenna sarae ombathu saavira uripi hadathae
aenna sarae eppathi haithu uripi hadathae
aenna sarae eppathi eattu uripi hadathae
aenna sarae moovathi mooru uripi hadathae
aenna sarae moovathi naaku uripi hadathae
aenna sarae nalavathi eattu uripi hadathae
aenna sarae haivathi haaru uripi hadathae
aenna sarae haravathi ombathu uripi hadathae
aenna sarae eambathi ondhu uripi hadathae
aenna sarae thombathi ondhu uripi hadathae
aenna sarae thombathi ezzhu uripi hadathae
aenna sarae noora naaku uripi hadathae
aenna sarae eranoora mooru uripi hadathae
aenna sarae saavirtha eambathi naaku uripi hadathae
aenna sarae ezzhnoora ezzhu uripi hadathae
aenna sarae saavirtha eppathi aeradu uripi hadathae
aenna sarae eatnoora ezzhu uripi hadathae
aenna sarae sillarae ellae ninna sarae attrae kodu
aenga semmey ogae aenga hatti tha thoda hatti
aenna sarae hainoora ondhu uripi hadathae
aenna sarae moovathi naaku uripi hadathae
aenna sarae saavirtha haivathi aeradu uripi hadathae
aenna sarae moovathi mooru uripi hadathae
bandi baputhuga jaama hara maka thava
na elli ebba havaka aellava harathae
aenna sarae haravathi ondhu uripi hadathae
aenna sarae haravathi eattu uripi hadathae
aenna sarae ethae maakae edhu ondhu mattu tha hadathae
aenna sarae ezzhnoora eattu uripi hadathae
aenna sarae thombathi haithu uripi hadathae
aenna sarae saavirtha eambathi ondhu uripi hadathae
ninna maejoodu halamaari ogasu hadathae noodu
aenna sarae saavirtha haravathi haithu uripi hadathae
aenna sarae saavirtha moovathi haaru uripi hadathae
aenna sarae saavirtha eattu uripi hadathae
aenna sarae thombathi ezzhu uripi hadathae
hana kaasu attrae tha aella madhichiyara
aenna sarae aerudu saavira uripi hadathae
na eni maellae ninnaga thaputhu ellae
na aena aegithae nee aena maadinthae
eni maellae ethae maka maadirae hasagatha nee
ninna amma na sarae na bathil aegarae
olleya paatu kaethu appara jaenna aipta
nennae na ninna appa na noodithae
nee hamana appara koopa maada gaenna
nanga aerada endhdhu paada ga oppa va
na ninga hatti gowda na arathae
endhdhu orrukuthu othina gelcha ga banthu buttae
ei saelae appara sooka ha hadathae
ei putti ya jaasthi neeru hadathae
ei bala paetti ogasu appara porulu hadathae
na eni maellaee nalubuthuga baputhu ellae
ninna maellae aennaga thani gava hadathae
aenna amma ninna kooda aena aegidha
emana siti manakana ogu aenthu aegu
eni maellae ethae aella aega baeda
na aena aegithae nee aena maadinthae
aenna sarae eranoora ondhu uripi hadathae
aenna sarae saavirtha eambathi aeradu uripi hadathae
sooga paatu kaethalae ollenge oruku banthara
aenna sarae noora naaku uripi hadathae
aenna sarae nanoora ombathu uripi hadathae
maranae tha na hatti ga odhae
ha kadaya orukuthu othina tharuthu butara
aenna sarae thombathi mooru uripi hadathae
aenna sarae saavirtha eppathi ondhu uripi hadathae
aenna sarae saavirtha nooru uripi hadathae
nae attrae jaama athae oora aenthu aeguthu mudiya
aenna sarae eambathi mooru uripi hadathae
aenna sarae saavirtha nalavathi haaru uripi hadathae
e paata kaethara appara santhoshava hadathae
aenna sarae saavirtha moovathi haaru uripi hadathae
aenna sarae eppathi haaru uripi hadathae
